verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron, <WH175> saying, <WH559>

Take <WH5375> the sum <WH7218> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> from among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> after their families, <WH4940> by the house <WH1004> of their fathers, <WH1>

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even until <WH5704> fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> all <WH3605> that enter <WH935> into <WH413> the host, <WH6635> to do <WH6213> the work <WH4399> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>
This <WH2063> shall be the service <WH5656> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> about the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> things:

And when the camp <WH4264> sets <WH5265> forward, <WH5265> Aaron <WH175> shall come, <WH935> and his sons, <WH1121> and they shall take <WH3381> down <WH3381> the covering <WH4539> veil, <WH6532> and cover <WH3680> the ark <WH727> of testimony <WH5715> with it:

And shall put <WH5414> thereon <WH5921> the covering <WH3681> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall spread <WH6566> over <WH4605> it a cloth <WH899> wholly <WH3632> of blue, <WH8504> and shall put <WH7760> in the staves <WH905> thereof.

And on the table <WH7979> of show bread <WH6440> they shall spread <WH6566> a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and put <WH5414> thereon <WH5921> the dishes, <WH7086> and the spoons, <WH3709> and the bowls, <WH4518> and covers <WH7184> to cover <WH5258> with: and the continual <WH8548> bread <WH3899> shall be thereon: <WH5921>

And they shall spread <WH6566> on them a cloth <WH899> of scarlet, <WH8144> <WH8438> and cover <WH3680> the same <WH853> with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put <WH7760> in the staves <WH905> thereof.

And they shall take <WH3947> a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and cover <WH3680> the candlestick <WH4501> of the light, <WH3974> and his lamps, <WH5216> and his tongs, <WH4457> and his firepans, <WH4289> and all <WH3605> the oil <WH8081> vessels <WH3627> thereof, with which <WH834> they minister <WH8334> to it:
And they shall put <WH5414> it and all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> thereof within <WH413> a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put <WH5414> it on a bar. <WH4132>

And on the golden <WH2091> altar <WH4196> they shall spread <WH6566> a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and cover <WH3680> it with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put <WH7725> to the staves <WH905> thereof:

And they shall take <WH3947> all <WH3605> the instruments <WH3627> of ministry, <WH8335> with which <WH834> they minister <WH8334> in the sanctuary, <WH6944> and put <WH5414> them in a cloth <WH899> of blue, <WH8504> and cover <WH3680> them with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and shall put <WH5414> them on <WH5921> a bar: <WH4132>
And they shall take away the ashes <WH1878> from the altar, <WH4196> and spread <WH6566> a purple <WH713> cloth <WH899> thereon: <WH5921>

And they shall put <WH5414> on it all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> thereof, with which <WH834> they minister <WH8334> about <WH5921> it, even the censers, <WH4289> the meat hooks, <WH4207> and the shovels, <WH3257> and the basins, <WH4219> all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> of the altar; <WH4196> and they shall spread <WH6566> on it a covering <WH3681> of badgers' <WH8476> skins, <WH5785> and put <WH7760> to the staves <WH905> of it.

And when Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> have made an end <WH3615> of covering <WH3680> the sanctuary, <WH6944> and all <WH3605> the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> as the camp <WH4264> is to set <WH5265> forward; <WH5265> after <WH310> that, the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> shall come <WH935> to bear <WH5375> it: but they shall not touch <WH5060> any holy <WH6944> thing, lest they die. <WH4191> These <WH428> things are the burden <WH4853> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And to the office <WH6486> of Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> pertains the oil <WH8081> for the light, <WH3974> and the sweet <WH5561> incense, <WH7004> and the daily <WH8548> meat offering, <WH4503> and the anointing <WH4888> oil, <WH8081> and the oversight <WH6486> of all <WH3605> the tabernacle, <WH4908> and of all <WH3605> that therein is, in the sanctuary, <WH6944> and in the vessels <WH3627> thereof.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron <WH175>saying, <WH559>
Cut <WH3772> you not off the tribe <WH7626> of the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956> from among <WH8432> the Levites: <WH3881>

But thus do <WH6213> to them, that they may live, <WH2421> and not die, <WH4191> when they approach <WH5066> to the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> things: Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall go <WH935> in, and appoint <WH7760> them every <WH376> one <WH376> to his service <WH5656> and to his burden: <WH4853>
But they shall not go <WH935> in to see <WH7200> when the holy <WH6944> things are covered, <WH1104> lest they die. <WH4191>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
Take <WH5375> also <WH1571> the sum <WH7218> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon, <WH1647> throughout the houses <WH1004> of their fathers, <WH1> by their families; <WH4940>

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> until <WH5704> fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shall you number <WH6485> them; all <WH3605> that enter <WH935> in to perform <WH6633> the service, <WH5656> to do <WH5647> the work <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>
This <WH2063> is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the Gershonites, <WH1649> to serve, <WH5647> and for burdens: <WH4853>

And they shall bear <WH5375> the curtains <WH3407> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> his covering, <WH4372> and the covering <WH4372> of the badgers' <WH8476> skins that is above <WH4605> on it, and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150>

And the hangings <WH7050> of the court, <WH2691> and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of the court, <WH2691> which <WH834> is by the tabernacle <WH4908> and by the altar <WH4196> round <WH5439> about, and their cords, <WH4340> and all <WH3605> the instruments <WH3627> of their service, <WH5656> and all <WH3605> that is made <WH6213> for them: so shall they serve. <WH5647>

At the appointment <WH6310> of Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall be all <WH3605> the service <WH5656> of the sons <WH1121> of the Gershonites, <WH1649> in all <WH3605> their burdens, <WH4853> and in all <WH3605> their service: <WH5656> and you shall appoint <WH6485> to them in charge <WH4931> all <WH3605> their burdens. <WH4853>

This <WH2063> is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1647> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150> and their charge <WH4931> shall be under the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>
As for the sons <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> you shall number <WH6485> them after their families, <WH4940> by the house <WH1004> of their fathers; <WH1>

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even to fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shall you number <WH6485> them, every <WH3605> one that enters <WH935> into the service, <WH6635> to do <WH5647> the work <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And this <WH2063> is the charge <WH4931> of their burden, <WH4853> according to all <WH3605> their service <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation; <WH4150> the boards <WH7175> of the tabernacle, <WH4908> and the bars <WH1280> thereof, and the pillars <WH5982> thereof, and sockets <WH134> thereof,

And the pillars <WH5982> of the court <WH2691> round <WH5439> about, and their sockets, <WH134> and their pins, <WH3489> and their cords, <WH4340> with all <WH3605> their instruments, <WH3627> and with all <WH3605> their service: <WH5656> and by name <WH8034> you shall reckon <WH6485> the instruments <WH3627> of the charge <WH4931> of their burden. <WH4853>

This <WH2063> is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> according to all <WH3605> their service, <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> under the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>

And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> and the chief <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> numbered <WH6485> the sons <WH1121> of the Kohathites <WH6956> after their families, <WH4940> and after the house <WH1004> of their fathers, <WH1>

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even to fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> every <WH3605> one that enters <WH935> into the service, <WH6635> for the work <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150>
And those that were numbered <WH6485> of them by their families <WH4940> were two thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and fifty. <WH2572>
